Package com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.admin.category

Class ImportCategoriesFromCsvServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.admin.category.ImportCategoriesFromCsvServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    @WebServlet("/admin/import-categories")
public class ImportCategoriesFromCsvServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    The ImportCategoriesFromCsvServlet is a servlet which task is to insert into the table categories data which is contained in a *.csv file. doPost method is overridden.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • doPost

        protected void doPost​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Method doPost reads uploaded *.csv file line by line. Data in each line is stored in an instance of Category and then on CategoryDao the method CategoryDao.insert(Connection, Category) is invoked.
        Overrides:
        doPost in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest object provided by Tomcat.
        response - HttpServletResponse object provided by Tomcat.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - is thrown if the request could not be handled.
        java.io.IOException - is thrown if an input or output exception occurs.
